ygData.subject: Mask of Deception and ultravision
ygData.msgSnippet: You would sing carillon first before sneaking.  The faction bonus it gives lasts until you zone. You then either activate illusion or sneak.  I m almost 100%
ygData.messageBody:
You would sing carillon first before sneaking. The faction bonus it gives
lasts until you zone. You then either activate illusion or sneak. I'm
almost 100% certain the illusion will give you a better /con than sneaking
so thats the best way to go.

Galtin of E'ci

> Singing carillion will deactivate sneak unfortunately.
>
> Kit
>
> With DE illusion up and the Carillon song, I can get my faction to the
> ogre
> merchants up to Amiable. Does sneaking with the Carillon get it to
> Warmly?
> If
> not then the illusion is better than sneaking when selling.
>
> Galtin of E'ci
> 33 bard
>
>
> > One point I'd like to make is that I've been using those vendors in
> Oggok
> a
> > lot lately, and if you sneak behind them and buy/sell your prices are a
> lot
> > better than as a DE, although sneaking is less convenient. .
>
>
